description: Sanjay Patel's Bollywood Bites food truck is a mobile catering services tending  to Los Angeles businesses, events and venues. Being a premium-grade culinary chef, Sanjay Patel pushes the boundaries of Indian Cuisine. With experience that is the proven  to be Hollywood's choice, Sanjay Patel seems to be present where there are international movie stars, politicians, and prominent public figures around.With over 20 years experience catering to the stars all over the world, Sanjay Patel inspires with his culinary masterpieces. With fine cuisine freshly prepared with spectacular presentation, Sanjay Patel knows what celebrities expect in quality. Sanjay Patel has been loyal to the Jackson family as a resident chef throughout the years. His fine talents have been recognized throughout the entertainment industry in Hollywood and Bollywood.I was the personal chef of Mr.Michael Jackson, do catering for most big Hollywood-Bollywood celebrities & 'Disney'. My principle is ALL NATURAL ALL FRESH.
name: Bollywood Bites
